00S.name: Farmer
00S.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker → 1 matching resource (grape, stone, wheat)
00S.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker

00S-1.name: Two Roads
00S-1.body: Place 2 roads, on croc-free spaces, start from building site or settlement, or continue road ☑ 2 resources → 3 rep
00S-1.details: on croc-free spaces, start from building site or settlement, or continue road (Cost: 2 resources)

00S-2.name: Settlement
00S-2.body: Place 1 settlement on a crocodile-free space, must be at least 1 space away from other settlements ☑ 1 grape, stone, & wheat → 3 rep & $3
00S-2.details: on a crocodile-free space, must be at least 1 space away from other settlements (Cost: 1 grape, stone, & wheat)

002.name: Gardener
002.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space adjacent to the channel → 1 rose
002.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to the channel

006.name: Senior Farmer
006.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker → 2 matching resources (grape, stone, wheat)
006.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker

008.name: Hermit
008.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space, all adjacent spaces must be undeveloped and contain no other workers → 2 rep
008.details: on an undeveloped space, all adjacent spaces must be undeveloped and contain no other workers

010.name: Senior Farmer
010.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker → 2 matching resources (grape, stone, wheat)
010.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker

012.name: Sacrifice
012.body: Place 1 building block on any building site ☑ 1 card (any card from hand, discard stack, or itself) → 1 rep & $3
012.details: on any building site (Cost: 1 card from hand, discard stack, or itself)

014.name: Wheat Supplier
014.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 2 wheat

016.name: Grape Supplier
016.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 2 grape

018.name: Stone Supplier
018.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 2 stone

020.name: New Settlement
020.body: Place 1 settlement on a croc-free space, must be at least 1 space away from other settlements ☑ 2 ≠ resources → 3 rep & $3
020.details: on a croc-free space, must be at least 1 space away from other settlements (Cost: 2 ≠ resources)

022.name: Refinement
022.body: Choose up to 2 resources (grape, stone, wheat, fish) you own → 1 matching resource for each chosen resource
022.summary: Choose up to 2 resources (grape, stone, wheat, fish) you own
022.extra: 1 matching resource for each chosen resource

024.name: Trader
024.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement 1-3 × 1 resource → 1 rose

026.name: Migrant Farmer
026.body: Move 1 worker 2 undeveloped spaces, or 2 workers onto 1 undeveloped space each → 1 matching resource (grape, stone, wheat) for each space
026.summary: Move 1 worker 2 undeveloped spaces, or 2 workers onto 1 undeveloped space each
026.extra: 1 matching resource (grape, stone, wheat) for each space

028.name: Supplier
028.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 2 resources (grape, stone, wheat, fish)

030.name: Marketer
030.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement 1-3 × $1 → 1 resource (grape, stone, wheat, fish)

032.name: Perfumer
032.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement 1-2 × 1 rose → 3 rep

034.name: Crook
034.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement 1-3 × 1 rep → $4

036.name: Thief
036.body: Take 1 card from the current market, place on your discard stack, then place Thief on discard stack
036.summary: Take 1 card from the current market, place on your discard stack, then place Thief on discard stack

038.name: Bridge
038.body: Place 1 bridge connecting 2 croc-free spaces on opposite sides of the channel (start from building site or settlement, or continue road) ☑ 2 resources (grape, stone, wheat) → 4 rep
038.details: connecting 2 croc-free spaces on opposite sides of the channel (start from building site or settlement, or continue road) (Cost: 2 resources (grape, stone, wheat))

040.name: Small Town
040.body: Place 1 town marker on any non-town settlement ☑ 1 grape, stone, & wheat → 5 rep & $2
040.details: on any non-town settlement (Cost: 1 grape, stone, & wheat)

042.name: Grower
042.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space adjacent to the channel → 2 rose
042.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to the channel

044.name: Farm
044.body: Place 1 workshop on any developed wheat space ☑ 1 grape & 1 stone → 3 rep & 3 wheat
044.details: on any developed wheat space (Cost: 1 grape & 1 stone)

046.name: Vineyard
046.body: Place 1 workshop on any developed grape space ☑ 1 stone & 1 wheat → 3 rep & 4 grape
046.details: on any developed grape space (Cost: 1 stone & 1 wheat)

048.name: Pit
048.body: Place 1 workshop on any developed stone space * 1 grape & 1 wheat → 3 rep & 3 stone
048.details: on any developed stone space (Cost: 1 grape & 1 wheat)

050.name: All-Rounder
050.body: Choose one: → top card of your discard stack / 1 resource (grape, stone, wheat, fish) / 1 rep
050.extra: top card of your discard stack / 1 resource (grape, stone, wheat, fish) / 1 rep

052.name: Order
052.body: Place 1-3 cards from hand onto the bottom of your discard stack → $2 per card
052.summary: Place 1-3 cards from hand onto the bottom of your discard stack

054.name: Expansion
054.body: Place 1 expansion on any non-expanded workshop ☑ 1 resource (grape, stone, wheat, fish) → 3 rep
054.details: on any non-expanded workshop (Cost: 1 resource (grape, stone, wheat, fish))

056.name: Assistant
056.body: Place 1 worker on any workshop → 3 matching resources (grape, stone, wheat)

058.name: Fisher
058.body: Place 1 worker on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker & the channel, or lake → 3 fish
058.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker & the channel, or lake

060.name: Gem Searchers
060.body: Choose one: 1-5 × $1 → lay down 1 worker or ☑ all laid-down workers → $3 for each removed worker
060.details: Option 1: Pay $1 (1 to 5 times) to lay down 1 worker. Option 2: Remove all laid-down workers to gain $3 for each removed worker.
060.extra: Option 1: lay down 1 worker. Option 2: $3 for each removed worker.

064.name: Bazaar
064.body: ☑ $2 → 1 card from the current market (pay only $1 if the card has a discount token)
064.details: (pay only $1 if the card has a discount token)

066.name: Wheat Trader
066.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 3 wheat

068.name: Grape Trader
068.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 3 grape

070.name: Stone Trader
070.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 3 stone

072.name: Monument
072.body: Place 1-3 building blocks on any building sites 1-3 × 1 stone → 2 rep

074.name: Homestead
074.body: Place 1 workshop on any developed wheat space * 1 grape & 1 stone → 3 rep & 4 wheat
074.details: on any developed wheat space (Cost: 1 grape & 1 stone)

076.name: Plantation
076.body: Place 1 workshop on any developed grape space * 1 stone & 1 wheat → 3 rep & 4 grape
076.details: on any developed grape space (Cost: 1 stone & 1 wheat)

078.name: Quarry
078.body: Place 1 workshop on any developed stone space * 1 grape & 1 wheat → 3 rep & 4 stone
078.details: on any developed stone space (Cost: 1 grape & 1 wheat)

080.name: Harvest Hands
080.body: Place 1-3 workers on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker 1-3 × $1 → 1 matching resource (grape, stone, wheat)
080.details: on an undeveloped space adjacent to another worker (Cost: 1-3 × $1)

082.name: Senior Supplier
082.body: Place 1 worker on any settlement → 3 resources (grape, stone, wheat, fish)

084.name: Town
084.body: Place 1 town marker on any non-town settlement ☑ 1 grape, stone, & wheat → 6 rep & $2
084.details: on any non-town settlement (Cost: 1 grape, stone, & wheat)

086.name: Escort
086.body: Move 1 worker 1-3 settlements (final destination must be empty) connected by roads, then remove that worker ☑ $2 / $4 / $6 → 4 / 5 / 6 rep
086.summary: Move 1 worker 1-3 settlements (final destination must be empty) connected by roads, then remove that worker

088.name: Papyrus
088.body: Copy the action of the top card of your discard stack
088.summary: Copy the action of the top card of your discard stack

090.name: Tax Collector
090.body: Place 1 worker on any workshop → $1 for each workshop and town on the map
090.extra: $1 for each workshop and town on the map

092.name: Five Roads
092.body: Place up to 5 roads, on crocodile-free spaces, start from building site or settlement, or continue road 1-5 × 1 resource → 1 rep
092.details: on crocodile-free spaces, start from building site or settlement, or continue road (Cost: 1-5 × 1 resource)

094.name: Banquet
094.body: Place 1 worker on any building site ☑ 1 grape, wheat, fish, & $6 → 8 rep
094.details: on any building site (Cost: 1 grape, wheat, fish, & $6)

096.name: Crocodile Sacrifice
096.body: Place 1 worker on any building site ☑ 1 crocodile → 3 rep

098.name: Baker
098.body: Place 1 worker on any wheat workshop ☑ 1 wheat → 2 rep & $5

100.name: Vintner
100.body: Place 1 worker on any grape workshop ☑ 1 grape → 2 rep & $5

102.name: Stonemason
102.body: Place 1 worker on any stone workshop ☑ 1 stone → 2 rep & $5

104.name: Channel Festival
104.body: Supply 1-9 settlements adjacent to the channel 1-9 × 1 resource → 2 rep per town, 1 rep per settlement
104.extra: 2 rep per town, 1 rep per settlement

106.name: Juggler
106.body: Place 1 worker on any town → $3 for each town on the map
106.extra: $3 for each town on the map

108.name: Masons' Work
108.body: Place 1 building block on any building site ☑ $3 & up to 5 ≠ resources → 1/3/5/10/15 rep
108.details: on any building site (Cost: $3 & up to 5 ≠ resources)

110.name: Harvest Festival
110.body: Supply 1-10 settlements connected by roads 1-10 × 1 resource → 2 rep per town, 1 rep per settlement
110.extra: 2 rep per town, 1 rep per settlement

112.name: Pharaoh
112.body: Place 1 worker on any town → 2 rep per town, 1 rep per settlement & building block directly connected to the Pharaoh
112.extra: 2 rep per town, 1 rep per settlement & building block directly connected to the Pharaoh

114.name: Mummy
114.body: Place 1 worker on any building site 1-10 × 1 resource → 1 rep per resource & building block

116.name: Treasurer
116.body: Place 1 worker on any building site 1-12 × $2 → 1 rep

118.name: Grand Bridge
118.body: Place 1 bridge connecting 2 croc-free spaces on opposite sides of the channel (start from building site or settlement, or continue road) ☑ 1 grape, stone, wheat & $5 → 12 rep
118.details: connecting 2 croc-free spaces on opposite sides of the channel (start from building site or settlement, or continue road) (Cost: 1 grape, stone, wheat & $5)

120.name: Palace
120.body: Place 1 palace on any town ☑ 2 grape, stone, & wheat → 15 rep
120.details: on any town (Cost: 2 grape, stone, & wheat)

122.name: Wasteland x2
122.body: Natural disaster, cannot be purchased → 1/0 rep

124.name: Heat x2
124.body: Natural disaster, cannot be purchased → 3/0 rep

126.name: Drought x2
126.body: Natural disaster, cannot be purchased → 6/0 rep

128.name: Sandstorm x3
128.body: Natural disaster, cannot be purchased → 10/6/0 rep
